channel.title: Change on Embrace Change, Shape the Future
channel.description: Recent content in Change on Embrace Change, Shape the Future

item.title: A chance is given
item.description: From time to time, the opportunity presents itself for a decision that would not normally be necessary. However, it opens up the possibility of moving in a direction that is both reminiscent of beautiful points in the past, appealing in its environment and brings a nice new challenge. A few months ago this opportunity reached me through a contact over Internet and with the beginning of this month it has become effective.
